title: Nang hnaih in
lyrics:
Chul lo tur ka rochan i ni,
Nunna leh thian aia hlu;
Van in kawng ka zawh mek lai hian,

Nang hnaih in (x4),
i kiangah min kaltir rawh.


Lei mawina leh nawmsak na te,
ka dil lo hning thanna nen;
Tuarna pawh ni se lawm tak in,

Nang hnaih in (x4),
i kiangah chauh kal ka duh.


Thih hlim kawr mn hruai kai ang che,
Damlai tui fawn hlauh awm nen;
Ka chatuan kawng khar mawi tak chu,

Nang hnaih in (x4),
hawn ka nuam Lalpa nang nen
